article: Professor Frisch moved to a new flat. Whenever _ , he would look out at the view through his telescope. One day, he caught sight of a _ -- a girl in a pink bikini was doing body-building exercises in the _ building. His blood boiled. Never in life had any girl attracted the man of 41. He knew it was wrong to peep but he just couldn't help _ . What's more, he didn't feel satisfied with watching her only once, so he _ all her private life.  Later he learnt the girl was a contestant of model contest of Texas. Her name was Crystal.  He found Crystal was a girl full of _ . Once she was broken-hearted over her dead dog, weeping at its _ now and then. To _ her of sadness, Frisch bought another dog and laid it at her door. To his joy, she accepted it and gradually turned happy again. From then on, whenever finding her _ he would put gifts at her door.  When the contest was at white heat, one thing happened. Julian, Crystal's opponent , was killed. The police found _ chain on the spot. _ Crystal explained the police simply didn't believe, because she could provide _ evidence.  Frisch was very _ . He knew one thing could serve well as the evidence ---- the videotape, but it would _ his wrongdoing. When he oversaw the police limit Crystal's movement to her house, so that she couldn't join in the final, he hesitated no more.  Crystal won Miss Texas. Meanwhile she knew she had been peeped at and that the peeper was _ but the one who had been caring about her _ . She went to visit the professor, but he had disappeared long before. She put an ad in the paper saying:  Dear Pro Frisch, everyone has his weakness, without excepting a great man. We accept your weakness as well as your _ . Please get in touch with me, for I _ you.
